column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Toph says : " That 's where I met them . "
#Text=Toph says : " They were blind , just like me .
#Text=" Aang says : " I learned from the monks , but the original airbenders were the sky bison .
#Text=Maybe you can give me a lesson sometime , buddy .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Well , this does n't help me .
#Text=The original firebenders were the dragons , and they 're extinct .
#Text=" Aang says : " What do you mean ?
#Text=Roku had a dragon , and there were plenty of dragons when I was a kid .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Well , they are n't around anymore , okay ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Okay , okay .
#Text=I 'm sorry .
#Text=" Zuko says : " But maybe there 's another way .
#Text=The first people to learn from the dragons were the ancient Sun Warriors .
#Text=" Aang says : " Sun Warriors ?
#Text=Well , I know they were n't around when I was a kid .
#Text=" Zuko says : " No , they died off thousands of years ago .
#Text=But their civilization was n't too far from where we are now .
#Text=Maybe we can learn something by poking around their ruins .
#Text=" Aang says : " It 's like the monks used to tell me .
#Text=Sometimes , the shadows of the past can be felt by the present .
#Text=" Sokka says : " So , what ?
#Text=Maybe you 'll pick up some super old Sun Warrior energy just by standing where they stood a thousand years ago ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " More or less .
#Text=Either I find a new way to firebend , or the Avatar has to find a new teacher .
#Text="
